entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
